CookieBanner.cookieConfigDescription2: Help us understand how you use the site so we can improve it.

hero.title: Isoart - EPS and PIR Solutions for Civil Construction
hero.description: Experts in thermal solutions with EPS and PIR for civil construction, packaging, and insulation. Roofing, ceilings, moldings, and more.

slide1.title: Decorative Moldings
slide1.description: EPS moldings for doors, windows, and walls. Lightweight, durable, and easy to install, ideal for decorative finishes in indoor and outdoor environments.

slide2.title: EPS Products for Civil Construction
slide2.description: EPS materials such as slabs, blocks, and beads for civil construction. They provide cost reduction, lightweight structure, and thermal insulation for residential and commercial projects.

slide3.title: Roofing and Panels
slide3.description: Isoart roofing and panels for coverings and facades. Available with or without EPS/PIR thermal insulation, offering energy efficiency and durability. Suitable for various construction projects.

defaults.heroDescription: Discover the ideal solution for efficient roofing with superior thermal insulation.
defaults.categoryDescriptionTitle: Isoart Thermal Roofing offers lightweight, cost-effective, and excellent thermal performance, optimizing construction and ensuring comfort at a lower cost.
defaults.categoryDescriptionText: Isoart Thermal Roofing is a lightweight and efficient solution for civil construction, replacing traditional systems with advantages. Produced with Rigid Insulating Polyisocyanurate (PIR) cores and galvalume steel coating, it provides lighter structures, reduced foundation loads, and faster construction. In addition to excellent thermal performance, it allows significant savings in concrete, steel, and labor, making it ideal for projects requiring productivity, comfort, and cost-effectiveness.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.description: Learn how ISOART protects and uses your personal data:

content.intro1: Isoart Thermal and Construction Products Industry Ltd. and its affiliated companies (collectively 'ISOART') use cookie technology to provide a better and more personalized service. This Cookie Policy ('Policy') is an integral part of our Privacy Policy.
content.intro2: The terms of this Policy apply to all Users and visitors of our website (hereinafter referred to as 'Site') to clearly and objectively inform about the use of cookies on the Site.
content.intro3: For more information on how ISOART processes your Personal Data, please refer to our Privacy Policy at www.isoart.com.br.
content.intro4: Upon accessing our Site for the first time, Users and visitors are informed through a text notice ('banner') regarding the use of cookies on the Site.
content.definitionsDesc: For the purposes of this Policy, the following definitions and descriptions should be considered for better understanding, whether in uppercase or lowercase, singular or plural, with or without bold:
content.personalData: Personal Data: any information related to an identified or identifiable natural person;
content.treatment: Processing: any operation performed with Personal Data, such as collection, production, receipt, classification, use, access, reproduction, transmission, distribution, processing, archiving, storage, deletion, evaluation or control of information, modification, communication, transfer, dissemination, or extraction;
content.user: User (or Users): all natural or legal persons registered who interact with the functionalities offered by ISOART;
content.logs: Logs: records of activities of visitors and Users verified on the Site.
content.cookiesDesc: 'Cookies' are small text or image files captured on our Site, stored on the devices used by Users who access them (e.g., computers, tablets, smartphones, etc.), where they are recorded for later retransmission to the same Site when the user revisits.
content.purposeDesc1: Cookies perform various functions, such as allowing efficient navigation between pages, storing preferences, and generally improving the browsing experience.
content.purposeDesc2: They can also help personalize displayed advertisements during browsing and targeted marketing activities for Users or visitors, ensuring they are sent according to their interests and preferences.
content.managementDesc1: Most internet browsers are configured by default to automatically accept cookies. However, most browsers allow cookie management to suit your preferences.
content.managementDesc2: Users and visitors can also regularly remove all cookies already on their devices by clearing their browser history. This will remove all cookies from all visited sites. However, be aware that disabling the cookies we use in your browser may cause certain sections or features of our Site to stop working.
content.managementDesc3: If Users or visitors use different devices to view and access our Site, they must ensure that each browser on each device is adjusted to meet their cookie preferences.
content.managementDesc4: For cookie management, the methods for configuring each browser differ. Below is a list of methods provided by major browsers to allow Users or visitors to manage cookie settings in their browser:
content.moreInfo: For more information on cookie settings, visit:
content.note: Please note that this list does not include all browsers; consult the 'Settings' or 'Support' sections of your browser.
content.revocation: Thus, you may revoke consent for the use of data at any time, without, however, rendering the processing of such data based on this consent illegitimate until the date of effective revocation.
content.cookiesUsedDesc: The Cookies used by our Site perform the following functions, as mentioned below:
content.functionalDesc: Functional Cookies allow us to record the choices Users and visitors select on our Site, such as language, remembering username/password, and preferences. With this information, we can provide more personalized functionalities to Users and visitors browsing our Site.
content.analyticsDesc: These Cookies allow us to collect information about how you use our Site and are used to help us understand how you interact with our Site, so we can provide a better user experience—for example, evaluating Site performance or testing different design ideas for the Site. We may work with third parties to perform these services, so these Cookies may be set by a third party.
content.structuralDesc: These Cookies are necessary for the website's operation and cannot be disabled in our systems. Typically, these cookies are predefined in response to service requests. In some cases, parts of the website may stop functioning.
content.marketingDesc: These Cookies are used for online behavioral advertising, generating information so users receive personalized content.
content.dartCookie: Dart Cookie – Google, as a third-party provider, uses cookies to display ads on websites. With the Dart Cookie, Google can request ads based on the visits the reader made to this and other websites on the internet. You can disable the Dart Cookie by visiting Google’s ad settings.
content.webBeacons: Web Beacons – We use these cookies to store information, such as personal preferences when visiting sites.
content.thirdPartyDesc: The ISOART website may maintain connections with other sites that complement or contain useful information and tools for visitors. However, if visitors and users access them, this privacy policy does not extend to third parties, and we are not responsible for their privacy policies or content.
content.rightsDesc: The rights of the data subject are guaranteed, particularly: access to data; correction of incomplete, inaccurate, or outdated data; confirmation of the existence of processing; anonymization, blocking, or deletion of unnecessary, excessive, or non-compliant data under the General Data Protection Law (Law 13.709 of August 14, 2018); data portability to another service or product provider upon express request, observing commercial and industrial secrets; deletion of processed personal data; information about data sharing with public or private entities; information about the consequences of not providing consent; and revocation of consent.
content.validityDesc: This Privacy Policy will remain in effect for an indefinite period.
content.contactDesc: If you have any questions or comments about this Cookie Policy, please contact us through our Relationship Channel on the website.

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.city: Santa Tereza do Oeste - Paraná - Brazil

headline.title: Expanded Polystyrene (EPS) and Rigid Polyisocyanurate (PIR): thermal efficiency, sustainability, and technology for modern constructions.

eps.title: EPS: Efficiency and Sustainability
eps.description: Expanded Polystyrene (EPS), popularly known as Styrofoam, is a lightweight and versatile material widely used for its thermal and acoustic insulation properties. Additionally, it is 100% recyclable and does not emit harmful substances to the environment, making it a sustainable choice for various applications.
eps.subtitle: Main EPS Benefits:
eps.applicationsDescription: Used in thermal and acoustic insulation, packaging, civil construction, decoration, and other applications. Ideal for commercial, industrial, and residential buildings, ensuring energy efficiency, comfort, and protection.

pir.title: PIR: High Technology and Safety
pir.description: Polyisocyanurate (PIR) is a high-performance insulating material, mainly used in the production of thermal roofing and panels. Produced in an automated continuous line, PIR ensures superior thermal insulation and high fire resistance, essential for industrial, commercial, and residential projects.
pir.subtitle: Main PIR Benefits:

benefits.benefit6: Sustainable, compliant with the Montreal Protocol

pirApplications.title: PIR Applications:
pirApplications.description: For roofing and/or closure of industrial and commercial buildings, such as supermarkets, shopping malls, distribution and storage centers, hospitals, agribusiness, gyms, and general industries, including residences.

revestimentos.title: Types of Coatings and Colors
revestimentos.description: Isoart PIR roofing and panels are available in different types of coatings and colors, ensuring flexibility to meet the specific needs of each project.

tipos.filmeAluminio: Aluminum film with white or black face

revestimentos.aviso: Standard White RAL 9003. Other colors are suggestions, availability upon consultation.

linhaProducao.title: Automated production for maximum efficiency
linhaProducao.description: Isoart PIR roofing and panels are manufactured in a continuous and fully automated line, ensuring high precision, quality, and sustainability. With a polyisocyanurate (PIR) insulating core and galvalume steel sheet coating, the process includes high-pressure injection, continuous pressing, and automated cutting, ensuring excellent adhesion, finishing, and standardization. All products are cooled, stacked, and packaged automatically, ready for shipment.

sustentabilidade.title: EPS Recycling: Sustainability and Smart Reuse
sustentabilidade.description: Expanded Polystyrene (EPS), popularly known as Styrofoam®, is a widely used and 100% recyclable material. Although not biodegradable, its recycling prevents environmental impacts, reducing the volume of waste in landfills.
sustentabilidade.aviso: Isoart has two internal recycling centers, where it fully reuses generated waste, reinforcing its commitment to sustainability.

incendio.title: PIR: The Protective Shield Against Fire Spread
incendio.description: The performance of Polyisocyanurate (PIR) in fire situations is one of its greatest advantages, offering an essential passive protection layer for any building. Unlike other materials, PIR does not contribute to the spread of flames.
incendio.description2: When exposed to fire, the PIR panel core reacts uniquely: it forms a stable and insulating carbonized layer on its surface. This carbon barrier acts as a protective shield, performing three crucial functions:

bloco1.legenda: The carbonized layer significantly slows material burning, containing the fire focus and preventing flames from spreading through the structure.

bloco2.legenda: Insulates the rest of the panel from intense heat, maintaining structural integrity for longer.

bloco3.legenda: Contributes to keeping escape routes more visible and safe.

incendio.teste: The test shown in the images proves this efficiency. Even under the direct action of a 30kW burner for 30 minutes, the fire was restricted to the contact area. At the end, the result was only superficial carbonization, with the rest of the panel intact and without any fire spread, demonstrating why PIR is the safest and smartest choice for your project.

heroHeadline.title: Innovative, sustainable, and high-quality solutions in

video.title: Isoart Institutional Video
video.caption: Since 2008, Isoart has led the market in innovative and sustainable solutions in Expanded Polystyrene (EPS) and Rigid Polyisocyanurate (PIR), meeting the diverse demands of industries, constructions, and other applications. With an unwavering commitment to quality, innovation, and sustainability, the company has solidified its position as a national reference in the sector.

timeline.title: A history marked by great successes:

2008.label: The First Steps
2008.description: Founded in Santa Tereza do Oeste, Paraná, Isoart began its journey with the purpose of offering innovative and sustainable solutions in Expanded Polystyrene (EPS). From the start, the company established a commitment to quality and transparency, serving various sectors with excellence and building a solid foundation of trust in the market.

2015.label: A New Chapter
2015.description: The expansion to Xanxerê, Santa Catarina, marked a turning point in Isoart’s history. The opening of Factory 2 brought new opportunities, consolidating the company as one of Brazil’s leading EPS processing industries. This unit not only increased production capacity but also reinforced the commitment to sustainability by focusing on the industrialization and recycling of EPS products.

2021.label: Expand Project
2021.description: With the launch of the Expand Project, Isoart opened the modern Factory 3 in Santa Tereza do Oeste, Paraná. This facility represents a milestone in the company’s evolution, designed to meet the demands of modern and sustainable constructions. Equipped with cutting-edge technology, Factory 3 produces thermal roofing and iso-panels in a continuous line, with insulating cores of Rigid Polyisocyanurate (PIR) or EPS.

map.title: Service throughout Brazil, Paraguay, and Uruguay.
map.description: Isoart has three strategically located factories in the western regions of Paraná and Santa Catarina, ensuring complete coverage across Brazilian, Paraguayan, and Uruguayan territories with excellence and quality.

missao.title: Mission
missao.description: Meet customer needs, exceeding their expectations, through excellence in the manufacture and distribution of EPS products, generating innovative solutions with profitability and respect for the environment.

visao.title: Vision
visao.description: To be recognized as the reference company in the sector, adding social and economic value, within ethical and sustainable principles.

valores.title: Values
valores.description: Commitment to quality, excellence in service, respect for the environment, transparency in actions, valuing life, innovation, and boldness.

quality.title: Quality Policy
quality.description1: The Isoart Group, through its Quality Policy, establishes guidelines to declare its commitment to the satisfaction of customers, employees, and the community.
quality.description2: To this end, we seek continuous improvement of the Quality Management System, basing our actions on the following premises:

items.item1: Ensure customer satisfaction by offering quality products and services.
items.item2: Share our values, building lasting partnerships that result in mutual gains.
items.item3: Maintain a good work environment, valuing safety and respect for life.
items.item4: Seek continuous improvement and process control through performance indicators, favoring the achievement and maintenance of competitive advantages.
items.item5: Promote sustainable actions aiming for minimal environmental impact.
items.item6: Train and develop all employees to comply with the Quality Policy.
